subject: [Lab 05] Q6: Add Characters
content:
Q6: Add Characters

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q6: Add Characters in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: I keep getting an IndexError: string index out of range even though I have implemented checks to make sure my function isn't indefinitely recursive. How do I go around this issue?

follow-ups.feedback: Index out of range isn't an infinite recursion. Rather, it is trying to access an index of a list or character of a string that isn't defined. For example, calling test[4] on test = 'abc' would yield an index out of range error.
